summary: CIA officer - handled anti-Castro Cuban group DRE, JFK assassination connection obscured
key_facts: CIA officer handling Cuban exile group DRE (1963)
DRE had contact with Lee Harvey Oswald months before JFK assassination
CIA liaison to House Select Committee on Assassinations (1978) - conflict of interest
Failed to disclose his 1963 DRE role to HSCA investigators
Records remain classified - CIA refused declassification in 1990s-2000s
Jefferson Morley lawsuit to force release of Joannides records
concealment: Active suppression of Joannides records by CIA, conflict of interest in HSCA role
